channel.title: docker on Ray's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in docker on Ray's Blog

item.title: Https for Harbor
item.description: https Exercise install Harbor and configure https. prepare install docker by get-docker script. install compose by compose github install wiki install harbor by harbor wiki lets getting CA mkdir /data/harbor-cert & cd /data/harbor-cert generate CA key openssl genrsa -out ca.key 4096 CA crt openssl req -x509 -new -nodes -sha512 -days 3650 \ -subj "/CN=yourdomain.com" \ -key ca.key \ -out ca.crt lets getting server certificate server key
